mapper.insert: insert into T_FILE_ERROR_INFO (FAMILY_CODE, USER_WATER_ADDRESS,THE_LINKMAN, MOBILE_PHONE,ERROR_DESCRIPTION_ACCESSORY_URL, PAPER_ACCESSORY_URL, OTHER_ACCESSORY_URL, CHECK_CODE,CREATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_TIME, DESCRIPTION, ENABLED, DEL_FLAG ) values (#{familyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useWaterAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{theLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{errorDescriptionAccessoryUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{papersAccessoryUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otherAccessoryUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},now(), now(), #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},1,0 )
